title: Is transfusion needed for a stable 45-year-old with 800 ml blood loss
Hb 7 gm/dl, and 80,000/µl platelets pre-surgery?
prompt_suggestions.content: Is transfusion needed for a stable 45-year-old with 800 ml blood loss, Hb 7 gm/dl, and 80,000/µl platelets pre-surgery? How many units?

title: Need a packed red cell transfusion
Does a stable 45-year-old, 70 kg patient with 8 gm/dl Hb who lost 600 ml blood during tibia surgery
prompt_suggestions.content: Does a stable 45-year-old, 70 kg patient with 8 gm/dl Hb who lost 600 ml blood during tibia surgery need a packed red cell transfusion? If so, how many units?

title: Compatibility and Cross-Matching
prompt_suggestions.content: How does the cross-matching process ensure compatibility between donor and recipient blood types to prevent transfusion reactions?

title: What are the potential long-term complications
